content.question: Which of the following is the most likely consequence of the trend for the change in sea ice shown in the graph, creating a positive feedback loop in the Arctic?

choices.label: Increasing albedo and increasing absorption of heat by the ocean
Increasing albedo and decreasing absorption of heat by the ocean
Decreasing albedo and increasing absorption of heat by the ocean
Decreasing albedo and decreasing absorption of heat by the ocean

content.answer: Decreasing albedo and increasing absorption of heat by the ocean

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
